definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
the best part of the show is yet to come/(with ironic tone) the worst is yet to come/you ain't seen nothin' yet
pinyin: hao3 xi4 hai2 zai4 hou4 tou5

definition: when the mice drag a shovel, the biggest thing comes second/the tip of the iceberg/the cockroach principle
pinyin: lao3 shu3 tuo1 mu4 xian1 , da4 tou2 zai4 hou4 tou5
containing_words.word: 老鼠拖木鍁，大頭在後頭

definition: the mantis stalks the cicada, unaware of the oriole behind (idiom, from Daoist classic Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); to pursue a narrow gain while neglecting a greater danger
pinyin: tang2 lang2 bu3 chan2 , huang2 que4 zai4 hou4

definition: the rear/far behind the front line
around/from beginning to end/all around/front and rear
behind/at the back/in the rear/behind sb's back
from now on/in the future/time to come
